collection.collection_description: Audio and Video assets on the topic of the Vietnam War, produced by WILL Radio and Television, including news stories, interview programs, public lectures, and oral history interviews.
collection_holder_name: Illinois Public Media, University of Illinois
collection.extent: 25 oral histories; 42 radio programs; 2 TV news stories
collection.historical_relevance: This collection represents coverage of the Vietnam War and related topics during and after the war. Its items are unique to this collection, including coverage of student protests at the University of Illinois, and oral histories of central Illinois residents who served during the war.
physical_formats: Optical disc (including CD, CD-R, CD-RW, DVD, DVD-R, DVD-RW, VCD)
Digital audio file (including MP3, WAV, AIFF, etc.)
collection.access_statement: Materials published online may be accessed by anyone at any time.
collection.supporting_documentation: Supporting documentation includes paper records of program schedules, Word documents containing radio program scripts, and internal project records. These records are poorly organized and located in different departments of WILL. Most of the relevant descriptive metadata has been aggregated on the WILL website at https://will.illinois.edu/vietnam/, along with access copies of the media files.
inventory_description: Digital text document (other than spreadsheet or database)
